clinical_study.brief_title: The Current Health Status of Patients Living With Type 1 Diabetes From the LMC Diabetes Patient Registry
clinical_study.official_title: Type 1 Diabetes in Canada: The Demographic, Care Profiles and Glycemic Control of Patients Living With Type 1 Diabetes From the LMC Diabetes Patient Registry

brief_summary.textblock: This retrospective study uses the Canadian LMC Diabetes Registry to describe the current health status of Canadians with type 1 diabetes. The study provides a detailed report of the demographic composition, treatment regimens, self-care approaches, health status, metabolic outcomes, and glycemic control of a large Canadian community-based, specialist-led cohort of patients with type 1 diabetes. Specific study outcomes will also be evaluated in a subgroup of patients using continuous subcutaneous insulin infusion (CSII) therapy.

secondary_outcome.description: Fasting plasma glucose will be measured by accessing patients medical records and it will be evaluated at one time point only. The value will be the last measured value for each patient between January 2015 and June 2019

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinical outcomes stratified by age group
secondary_outcome.description: Age groups include 18-25 years, 26-49 years, and greater or equal to 50 years

other_outcome.measure: Mean CGM glucose
other_outcome.description: Mean CGM glucose in sub-group of patients with available CGM data. The last 5 to 90 days of the patients CGM data will be accessed from the patients medical records.

other_outcome.measure: Time in range
other_outcome.description: Percentage of time with CGM glucose concentration between 4-10 mmol/L in sub-group of patients with available CGM data. The last 5 to 90 days of the patients CGM data will be accessed from the patients medical records.

other_outcome.measure: Time in hypoglycemia
other_outcome.description: Percentage of time with CGM glucose concentration < 4 mmol/L in sub-group of patients with available CGM data. The last 5 to 90 days of the patients CGM data will be accessed from the patients medical records.

other_outcome.measure: Time in hyperglycemia
other_outcome.description: Percentage of time with CGM glucose concentration > 10 mmol/L in sub-group of patients with available CGM data. The last 5 to 90 days of the patients CGM data will be accessed from the patients medical records.

other_outcome.measure: Standard deviation (SD) of CGM glucose
other_outcome.description: SD (mmol/L) of CGM glucose in sub-group of patients with available CGM data. The last 5 to 90 days of the patients CGM data will be accessed from the patients medical records.

other_outcome.measure: Co-efficient of variation (CV) of CGM glucose
other_outcome.description: Proportion of patients with CV ≤ 36% and CV >36% in sub-group of patients with available CGM data. The last 5 to 90 days of the patients CGM data will be accessed from the patients medical records.

other_outcome.measure: HbA1c at referral
other_outcome.description: Mean HbA1c (%) in the six months prior to referral. The last measured value will be used and will be accessed through the patients medical records.

other_outcome.measure: HbA1c in sub-group of patients using CSII therapy
other_outcome.description: HbA1c will be measured by accessing patients medical records and it will be evaluated at one time point only. The value will be the last measured value for each patient between January 2015 and June 2019.

other_outcome.measure: Brand of insulin pump
other_outcome.description: The proportion of patients using each type of insulin pump model will be reported in the sub-group of patients using CSII therapy

other_outcome.measure: Brand of bolus insulin
other_outcome.description: The proportion of patients using each type of bolus insulin brand will be reported in the sub-group of patients using CSII therapy

other_outcome.measure: Sociodemographics in the subgroup of patients using CSII therapy
other_outcome.description: Sociodemographics include age, gender, ethnicity, education, household income and health coverage.

other_outcome.measure: Weekly incidence of any self-reported hypoglcyemia in the subgroup of patients using CSII therapy
other_outcome.description: Weekly incidence of any self-reported hypoglycemia will be measured by accessing patients medical records and it will be evaluated at one time point only. The value will be the last measured value for each patient between January 2015 and June 2019.

other_outcome.measure: Yearly incidence of severe hypoglycemia in the subgroup of patients using CSII therapy
other_outcome.description: Yearly incidence of severe hypoglycemia will be measured by accessing patients medical records and it will be evaluated at one time point only. The value will be the last measured value for each patient between January 2015 and June 2019.

other_outcome.measure: Weight in the subgroup of patients using CSII therapy
other_outcome.description: Weight will be measured by accessing patients medical records and it will be evaluated at one time point only. The value will be the last measured value for each patient between January 2015 and June 2019.

other_outcome.measure: BMI in the subgroup of patients using CSII therapy
other_outcome.description: BMI will be measured by accessing patients medical records and it will be evaluated at one time point only. The value will be the last measured value for each patient between January 2015 and June 2019.

other_outcome.measure: eGFR in the subgroup of patients using CSII therapy
other_outcome.description: eGFR will be expressed as the proportion of patients with eGFR <30, 30 to 60 and >60 mL/min/1.73 m2. eGFR will be measured by accessing patients medical records and it will be evaluated at one time point only. The value will be the last measured value for each patient between January 2015 and June 2019.

other_outcome.measure: LDL-cholesterol in the subgroup of patients using CSII therapy
other_outcome.description: LDL cholesterol will be expressed as a mean and the proportion of patients with LDL-cholesterol ≤ 2 mmol/L and >2 mmol/L. LDL cholesterol will be measured by accessing patients medical records and it will be evaluated at one time point only. The value will be the last measured value for each patient between January 2015 and June 2019.

other_outcome.measure: Blood pressure in the subgroup of patients using CSII therapy
other_outcome.description: Blood pressure will be measured by accessing patients medical records and it will be evaluated at one time point only. The value will be the last measured value for each patient between January 2015 and June 2019.

other_outcome.measure: Comorbidities in the subgroup of patients using CSII therapy
other_outcome.description: Comorbidities include microvascular complications and macrovascular complications.

other_outcome.measure: HbA1c in the subgroup of patients using CSII therapy and using a do-it-yourself (DIY) closed loop system
other_outcome.description: The last available HbA1c measurement will be used that was collected between January 2015 and June 2019

other_outcome.measure: HbA1c in the subgroup of patients using CSII therapy and using a hybrid closed loop system
other_outcome.description: The last available HbA1c measurement will be used that was collected between January 2015 and June 2019

other_outcome.measure: HbA1c in the subgroup of patients using CSII therapy, stratified by age group
other_outcome.description: The last available HbA1c measurement will be used that was collected between January 2015 and June 2019. Age categories will include 18-25 years, 26-49 years, and greater than or equal to 50 years.

other_outcome.measure: CGM metrics in the subgroup of patients using CSII therapy and a CGM device
other_outcome.description: CGM metrics include: mean CGM glucose, SD of CGM glucose, time in range, time in hyperglycemia, time in hypoglycemia, and co-efficient of variation of CGM glucose. The last 5 to 90 days of patients data will be used.

other_outcome.measure: HbA1c in the subgroup of patients using a CGM device
other_outcome.description: The last available HbA1c measurement will be used that was collected between January 2015 and June 2019. This outcome will be further stratified by CSII vs MDI therapy.

other_outcome.measure: HbA1c in the subgroup of patients using CSII therapy, stratified by mean self-measured blood glucose testing frequency.
other_outcome.description: HbA1c will be evaluated in patients who have a mean daily testing frequency < two times/day and ≥ two times/day. The last week of recorded self-measured blood glucose testing frequency data will be used (between January 2015 and June 2019).

other_outcome.measure: HbA1c in the subgroup of patients using CSII therapy, stratified by patients considered "atypical" for pumping by Canadian regulatory authorities
other_outcome.description: HbA1c will be evaluated in patients who use carbohydrate counting to calculate insulin dose <50% of the time and <20% of the time

study_pop.textblock: Patients with type 1 diabetes under the care of an endocrinologist at an LMC Healthcare centre, in the provinces of Ontario, Quebec, or Alberta, Canada.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Clinical diagnosis of type 1 diabetes for ≥ 6 months
- Assessed by an LMC endocrinologist between July 1, 2015 and June 30, 2018
- Followed by an LMC endocrinologist for > 6 months
- Informed consent provided and signed for medical record data to be used for research purposes
Exclusion Criteria:
- clinical diagnosis of type 2 diabetes
